H1_split_answer1:
Yo, it's ReactJS, I'm the king of the scene,  
Component-based structure, you know what I mean?  
While Angular's stuck in its two-way bind,  
I got one-way data flow, I'm ahead of the grind.  

Virtual DOM's my game, I render so fast,  
While Angular's digest cycle just can't keep up, it won't last.  
JSX in my veins, I mix HTML with flair,  
Angular's templates? Man, they just can't compare.  

State management's a breeze, with Redux in my crew,  
While you're tangled in services, what you gonna do?  
So step aside, Angular, let the real deal shine,  
In the world of frameworks, I'm the one that's divine.  

Hooks got me flexin', reusing code like a pro,  
While Angular's directives just steal the show slow.  
I got my community, we’re building with pride,  
With every new release, I’m the one they ride.  

So if you want speed, and a UI that’s clean,  
Join the ReactJS fam, you know what I mean!  
From components to props, we’re breaking the mold,  
In this JavaScript battle, watch my story unfold.
H1_split_answer2:
Yo, check it, I'm React, the library that's fly,  
While Angular's got its modules, I'm the reason why.  
Lightweight and nimble, I keep it all clean,  
With hooks in my toolkit, I'm the coding machine.  

You got your two-way binding, but I keep it tight,  
With props and state, I make everything right.  
My ecosystem's thriving, with tools like Next.js,  
While Angular's still figuring out how to impress.  

So let's raise a toast to the future of code,  
In this battle of frameworks, I'm the one who'll explode!  
With my virtual DOM, I render with ease,  
While Angular's digest cycle brings developers to their knees.  

Component-based structure, I’m modular and slick,  
Building UIs fast, that’s my magic trick.  
So when you’re coding, remember this rap,  
React’s the king, and that’s a fact!
